content.description: This route starts standing on the shelf with hands at the beginning of the line of pockets. The crux is the last three moves from the end of the pockets to the top-out. Also, keeping your hands dry to keep from ripping your skin on the sharp pockets is extremely important
content.protection: Deep water. If you fall before you get your feet up, it's advisable to kick away from the wall and fall feet first
content.location: Given that it's such a small area, this rock is the only one by the shelf that looks climbable. The line of pockets starts along the face immediately to the right of the shelf that makes up the climbing area.

content.description: A small crag to the right of the upper falls when facing the pool below them.
